page.title: 02General Information
page.content: Thurgoland covers about 40 acres.There are new houses at the top and down the road from my house.Adam Sikora lives at the top estate.There are about 40 new houses at the top of Thurgoland and there's going to be eighty houses at the bottom.There is a Village Hall and a Youth Club,a School,a Church and a Chapel.There are 3 pubs called Horse and Jockey,Green Dragon and The Bridge Inn.There are five shops Burtofts,Celia's, the Paper Shop,the Naz Superstore and a Post Office.The bus route to main places is Sheffield,Penistone,Stocksbridge and Barnsley.There's an old School which was built in 1792.There's a main road which is busy.Recently three people have been killed on it.So now there's traffic lights at the crossroads.
